title: 'Giver' Fans Likely To Be Disappointed By Movie's Pace
teaser: The new movie The Giver stars Meryl Streep and Jeff Bridges. It's an adaptation of the young adult novel by Lois Lowry about a world where emotion and feeling have been done away with.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
